source.label: Info for those with normal blood pressure

cards.summary: Standard high blood pressure guidelines do not apply
cards.detail: {{#patient}}As you already have a high blood pressure diagnosis, please see your provider regarding your recent high blood pressure reading.{{/patient}}{{#careTeam}}{{/careTeam}}|https://www.ahajournals.org/doi/10.1161/HYPERTENSIONAHA.120.15016||at-most-one|https://www.mayoclinic.org/diseases-conditions/secondary-hypertension/symptoms-causes/syc-20350679#:~:text=Secondary%20hypertension%20(secondary%20high%20blood,arteries%2C%20heart%20or%20endocrine%20system.
